QuestData.Title: The Serpent's Heart
QuestData.Description: You've done great here, kid. Thanks to you, we have quite a bit of extra jade, and I know just the someone who could use it.$B$BMy friend Foreman Raike is running the great statue project at the Serpent's Heart.$B$BBring a shipment of extra jade to him, and tell him his old friend Mann says hello. He'll be eagerly waiting your arrival.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Foreman Raike at the Serpent's Heart in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Am I seeing this right? A whole shipment of pure, high quality uncut jade?$B$BThank goodness. I knew Foreman Mann would come through for us.$B$BOh and you too. Thanks for bringing it by.
